name: Football Match
description: The temptation is to chase the action around the pitch. This will end up meaning youâ€™re running as much as the players. It will benefit you to select one position.

name: Cricket Match
description: I have done 325 Tests, all completed ones. That includes 98 Ashes Tests. Richie Benaud and John Woodcock, the former Times cricket correspondent.

name: Tennis Match
description: Last Monday I started a three-part series giving an insight into the work of tennis photographers, thanks to our wonderful Jimmie48 traveled the world.

name: Boxing Match
description: In sports photography, the difference between a good shot and a great one comes down to timing. That's especially the case with boxing.

name: Others Game
description: Photography games are pretty satisfying. Spending ages getting the right framing, tweaking the composition, and taking that shot is a feeling like nothing else.

name: Local Match
description: Thane District FA women's team assaulted photographer Pushpak Shirwadkar, after they were peeved at their team's suspension from the Maharashtra.
